name: Spawn (GBC)
description:
Evil Meets Its Match!

Spawn must fight his way down to the depths of Hell to annihilate the forces that enslave him and threaten to destroy the world of the living.

  • Battle the minions of Malebolgia as you venture through seven Chapters toward the fiery dominion.
  • Encounter 9 characters including the Clown and the Redeemerr> - Wield a chain and machine gun, ride a motorbike, and journey from Heaven to Hell in your quest for righteousness.
